forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
